entry.def: If a prisoner is given parole, he or she is released before the official end of their prison sentence and has to promise to behave well.

example.ex: Although sentenced to life, he will become eligible for parole after serving 10 years.
example.tran: 虽然被判终身监禁，但是他在服刑10年后可以申请假释。

entry.def: If a prisoner is paroled, he or she is given parole.

example.ex: He faces at most 12 years in prison and could be paroled after eight years.
example.tran: 他面临最高12年监禁，8年后可以获得假释。
